        public static double getQuartile(double[] sortedData,
                                 int nthQuartile)
        Uses linear interpolation to calculate the quartiles.
        Same as QUARTILE.EXC in Excel.
        Parameters:
        sortedData - the sorted data set
        nthQuartile - an integer (1,2 or 3)
        Returns:
        the nth quartile
